abstracts.cdata!:
The project would finance: (a) about 20
            man/years of advisory consultant's services to
            strengthen key government services in the Ministries of
            Economy and Planning, Agriculture, Transport, Equipment and
            Housing, Energy and Mining, involved in investment planning
            policy analysis and project processing; (b) about 130
            man/months of short and medium-term consultancies to
            undertake project-related policy and project preparation
            studies in the areas of agricultural and urban development;
            and (c) about 60 man/months of consultancies and other
            provisions for training of local project personnel and for
            the development of Cameroonian institutions concerned with
            preinvestment and project work.
